A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The longer I think about this movie\, the more I don't like it. Finn's storyline was terrible and seemed like something out of a Fantastic Beasts movie. They ruined Luke's character. They barely explained anything\, especially about Snoke. Kylo Ren and some good moments of cinematography basically carried this movie. It's not quite \"Attack of the Clones\" level bad\, but it's sort of close. Thank God Rian Johnson isn't making the next one.
